modShortDescription: Tongo Mod 2.0 arrives with tons of new features. Level adjustment, new objects, consumables, machines, quest, recipes, and a new system to unlock recipes.
modDescription:
Get more and enjoy it.

Tongo Mod 2.0 arrives with tons of new features. Level adjustment, new objects, consumables, machines, [quest](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-quests/), recipes, and a new system to unlock recipes.

Rapid character development, and not limited by levels or recipes that donâ€™t want to come out.

Short detail main features:

* Leveled loot stage in all biomes
* Reduced percentage of experience points per level
* 2 [skill points](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) gained per level
* Over 70 new objects
* 8 classes with 5 quests each
* Recipes are not unlocked by level
* 7 new machines
* All recipes and [books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) are unlocked by blue papers
* Mods are included to improve the loot stage

There is a lot of content in the mod, but I better let you discover it.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wjykq0a5lxOLzugOxx90t3uRRr-S4ij0/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** Tekja
